use_max.description: If set to C(yes), the maximal value will be used or conserved. If the specified value is superior to the value in the file, file content is replaced with the new value, else content is not modified.

use_min.description: If set to C(yes), the minimal value will be used or conserved. If the specified value is inferior to the value in the file, file content is replaced with the new value, else content is not modified.

limit_type.description: Limit type, see C(man limits) for an explanation

backup.description: Create a backup file including the timestamp information so you can get the original file back if you somehow clobbered it incorrectly.
